name: Fox Runner (Lysard)
description:
Infinite Runner project Term 3 of Game Design Major 2021!

This is an infinite runner game we had to make for term 3 in my first year Game Design Major.

Its the typical infinite runner experience where you have 3 lanes you can switch to to dodge obstacles.  Collect as many apples as you can, however watch out for the big ones! They hurt. In this game you can also attack big apples so they do not hurt you!

 I had very limited knowledge of c# at that time as well as lighting. However I did learn to problem solve a lot. All the Pixel art is my own.
